description:
Midoriba Itsuki is the classmate of Rin and one of the known top students in the school. Itsuki is also a self-styled ladies-man (enrolled into this school that fills with beautiful girls from other realms is a dream come true for him) and that makes Rin more than once embarassed to be associated with Itsuki.
[from AnimeNfo]
name: Midoriba Itsuki
